named-query.name: FIND_INACTIVE_SHOPPING_CART_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT sc.uidPk FROM ShoppingCartMementoImpl sc WHERE sc.status = 'INACTIVE'

named-query.name: FIND_ABANDONED_SHOPPING_CART_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT sc.uidPk FROM ShoppingCartMementoImpl sc WHERE sc.lastModifiedDate <= ?1

named-query.name: DELETE_SHOPPING_CART_BY_UIDS
named-query.query: DELETE FROM ShoppingCartMementoImpl sc WHERE sc.uidPk IN (:list)

named-query.name: DISABLE_PARENT_CHILD_CART_ITEM_RELATION_BY_SHOPPING_CART_UIDS
named-query.query: UPDATE ShoppingItemImpl si SET si.parentItemUid = null WHERE si.childItemCartUid IN (:list)
